entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 7:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
